attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore the offer of knighthood for his fund raising achievement
attributes.additional_details: Force the government to put pressure on our monarchy to ensure Tom receives this accolade
attributes.background: With the recent unfounded selfless act of fund raising at such a remarkable age that has gripped the nation at torid time for the world, Tom's achievement for the NHS is incredibly passionate and much deserved. This gent deserves recognition for his contribution.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
